level.label: Level
level.hint: The level at which this advancement can be granted.

guaranteed.label: Guaranteed Increases
guaranteed.hint: Increase each of these scores by 1.

choices.label: Increase Choices
choices.hint: Increase one of these scores by 1. Overlap with guaranteed will be ignored.

CHARACTERISTIC.CharacteristicHint: All guaranteed increases will be given, and the advancement will provide an option between the choices.

chooseN.label: Choice
chooseN.hint: How many of the items can be picked when this advancement is configured. If left blank or if the number is greater than the number of items available, all the items are granted.

type.label: Additional Type
type.hint: Allow other items of the selected type.

perkType.label: Perk Type
perkType.hint: If empty, all perk types are allowed.

chooseN.label: Choice
chooseN.hint: How many of the traits can be picked when this advancement is configured. If left blank or if the number is greater than the number of traits available, all the traits are granted.

any.label: Pick Any
any.hint: Ignore the specific list of choices or groups and allow the character to pick any trait.

languages.label: Language Choices
languages.hint: Specific languages that can be chosen in this advancement. If this is empty, any language can be chosen.

choices.label: Skill Choices
choices.hint: Specific skills that can be chosen in this advancement. If this and skill groups are empty, any skill can be chosen.

groups.label: Skill Groups
groups.hint: Groups of skills that can be chosen in this advancement.

WARNING.cannotAddNewType: You cannot add a new {type} to a character that already has one.
WARNING.restrictedType: {type} items cannot be added as advancements.
WARNING.requirePack: Granted items must come from a compendium pack.
WARNING.forbidParent: Granted items cannot be embedded in an actor.

Characteristic.label: Characteristic
Characteristic.hint: Increase choice by 1 to a maximum of {n}.

Error.FilterFail: Dropped Item did not conform to requirements.
Error.MustItem: You can only drop items into an item grant.

DeleteDialog.Content: The following items will be deleted:

ConfirmItemGrant.Title: Reconfigure Item Grant
ConfirmItemGrant.Content: This will delete and recreate the granted items.

ignoredImmunities.label: Ignored Immunities
ignoredImmunities.hint: Select which damage immunity types this effect should ignore. Select 'All Immunities' to ignore all immunities.

display.label: Display
display.hint: '{{potency}}' will be replaced with the derived potency info (i.e. M<2).
display.hintForced: '{{potency}}' will be replaced with the derived potency info (i.e. M<2). '{{forced}}' will be replaced with the derived forced movement info (i.e. Push or Pull 3).

characteristic.label: Potency Characteristic
characteristic.hint: Tiers 2 and 3 will default to the chosen characteristic of the prior tier.

SHEET.NoCreateAdvancement: {name} could not be created as part of the folder drop because it has advancements.

Gain.NoSelection: You must select hero tokens to gain resources.

ApplyEffect.NoSelection: You must select tokens to apply the effect to.

CompendiumSource.Label: Compendium Source
CompendiumSource.ConfirmDeleteContent: Are you sure? Removing the compendium source reference permanently will prevent the application of updates and errata.

UpdateFrom.Label: Update from Compendium
UpdateFrom.Title: Overwrite Document Data
UpdateFrom.Content: Updating {name} will reset its data to match the compendium copy, including any embedded documents and descriptions.

turns.label: Turns Per Round
turns.hint: Some monsters get additional turns every round.

threshold.label: Save Threshold
threshold.hint: The total necessary to end a (Save Ends) effect.

SpendRecovery.tooltip: Spend a recovery to regain stamina.

Notifications.NoRecoveries: {actor} does not have any recoveries to spend.
Notifications.Success: {actor} has spent a recovery to regain stamina.

CharacteristicInput.Title: Edit Characteristics
CharacteristicInput.Hint: The inputs represent initial values before active effects and advancements. The bottom row represents increases from advancements.

FreeStrike.MultiLinked: You can only target one copy of a linked actor.
FreeStrike.NoTargets: Select one or more targets to make a free strike!

DamageNotification.ImmunityReducedToZero: {name}'s immunities have reduced the damage to zero.

Errors.TOKEN_CREATE: You do not have permission to create new Tokens!
Errors.WILDCARD: You must have 'Use File Browser' permissions to summon creatures with wildcard artwork.

Modes.Label: Initiative Mode
Modes.Hint: Default is each side choose who goes next, alternative uses an agility test to set the order.

RollFirst.Heroes: The Heroes Determine Who Goes First!
RollFirst.Enemies: The Director Determines Who Goes First!

AwardVictories.label: Victories Awarded
AwardVictories.hint: How many victories to award to each character in the combat.

CombatantGroup.TypeHint: A Base combatant group can have any number of non-minion members. A Squad can have any number of minions plus up to one non-minion captain.

Error.MinionMustSquad: Minions can only be added to Squad groups.
Error.MinionNoSquad: Applying damage directly to a minion because it's not in a squad.
Error.TooManySquad: Applying damage directly to a minion because it's in multiple squads.

Item.LimitWorldCreateTooltip: Certain item types (Class, Subclass, Ancestry, Career, Kit) must be created inside of a compendium and cannot be created in-world.

ability.EmbedFail: Failed to find item for this ability roll
ability.Restricted: A condition or ability effect is restricting the usage of this ability.

AnyLanguageAdvancement.name: Any Language
AnyLanguageAdvancement.description: You know the language of your chosen culture.

SignatureAbilityAdvancement.name: Signature Ability
SignatureAbilityAdvancement.description: Each kit grants a signature ability.

classLink.label: Class Link
classLink.hint: The Draw Steel ID of the parent class, which can be found in the class's Source Information.

ERRORS.NeedClass: You can only add a subclass to characters with a class
ERRORS.WrongDSID: The expected DSID {expected} did not match the current class's DSID of {actual}.

project.CompletedNotification: {actor} has achieved enough project points to complete the {project} project.

SpendCareerPoints.Title: Spend Career Points
SpendCareerPoints.Label: How many points do you want to spend?
SpendCareerPoints.Success: {actor} has spent {points} project points from their career on {project}.

Events.RollTriggered: The event roll triggers an event!
Events.MilestoneTriggered: This project has passed the milestone for {events} event(s)!

ActiveEffect.Name: Effect
ActiveEffect.ImmunityWarning: Target has immunity to the following conditions: {conditions}

TargetedConditionPrompt.Title: {condition} Configuration
TargetedConditionPrompt.Prompt: Target the actor causing the {condition} condition
TargetedConditionPrompt.NoneSelected: No actor has been selected as causing the {condition} condition

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.hint: All keywords that an ability must have to receive these modifications.

reference.label: Reference
reference.hint: A JournalEntryPage that serves as a full reference description for this keyword.

config.duplicateEntry: Key is duplicate of existing CONFIG entry!
config.pageNameIsGroup: The name of this page will be the group for the keywords.

artDescription.label: Art Description
artDescription.hint: The Art Description fills in the alt text attribute of the image, improving accessibility for screen readers and helping viewers discover new elements within an image if they are ambiguous, unfamiliar, or framed in an atypical way.

tooltip.label: Tooltip
tooltip.hint: Preferred tooltip text. If blank, the normal journal content will be preferred.

Damage.NoTokenSelected: You must have at least one token selected.

Setting.NoActiveGM: This requires an active GM logged into the world.

HeroTokens.Label: Hero Tokens
HeroTokens.Hint: Hero tokens are a group resource that is tracked by the players and kept in a pool that is accessible to all their characters.
HeroTokens.WarnDirectorBadSpend: {name} attempted to spend a hero token while none were available.
HeroTokens.StartSession: The Director reset the number of hero tokens to {count} for the start of the session.

GainSurges.tooltip: Spend a hero token to gain two surges.
GainSurges.label: Gain Surges
GainSurges.messageContent: Spends a hero token to gain two surges.
GainSurges.dialogContent: Spend one of {value} hero tokens to gain two surges.

SucceedSave.label: Succeed on a Saving Throw
SucceedSave.messageContent: Spends a hero token to succeed on a saving throw instead of failing.

RerollTest.label: Reroll Test
RerollTest.messageContent: Spends a hero token to reroll a test. They must use the new roll.

RegainStamina.label: Regain Stamina
RegainStamina.messageContent: Spends two hero tokens to regain stamina equal to their recovery value.
RegainStamina.dialogContent: Spend two of {value} hero tokens to regain stamina equal to recovery value.

Malice.Label: Malice
Malice.Hint: Malice is a resource gained by the Director. You use malice to let enemies in the game activate their most powerful abilities and throw surprises at the heroes during combat.

AdjustMalice.label: Adjust Malice
AdjustMalice.hint: Positive numbers will increase the value and negative numbers will decrease the value.

Malice.PlayerError: Malice can only be updated by a GM.

ShowPlayerMalice.Label: Show Malice Value To Players
ShowPlayerMalice.Hint: Display the current Malice value to players.

ProjectEvents.Label: Project Event Trigger
ProjectEvents.Hint: How should project event timing be determined?

UpdateFromCompendium.Label: Update from Compendium
UpdateFromCompendium.Hint: Minimum user level to access the Update from Compendium option in NPC and Item sheets.

XPAdvancement.Label: XP Advancement
XPAdvancement.Hint: The XP advancement pace to use for hero progression. Normal is 16 XP per level. Double is is 8 xp per level. Half is 32 xp per level.

WARNING.noActiveGM: No active GM was found to be able to handle the request.
WARNING.invalidSpendType: The spend type [{spendType}] requested by [{name}] is not valid for hero tokens.

abilityResult.NoPRE: The Power Roll Effect could not be found.

HeroToken.Label: Hero Token
HeroToken.Tooltip: Succeed by spending a Hero Token
HeroToken.NoOwner: You no longer have update permissions for this effect.

HeroTokenReroll.label: Hero Token
HeroTokenReroll.tooltip: Reroll the test. You must use the new roll.

Create.NotOwnedItem: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items.

Roll.NoItem: Could not find item. You may need to delete and recreate this macro.
Roll.NotOwnedItem: {item} is not an owned item. Only owned items may be rolled.
Roll.NoRoll: {item} does not have a roll function.

BlocksLineOfEffect.label: Blocks Line of Effect
BlocksLineOfEffect.hint: Should this wall block line of effect between tokens?
